altTitles.ja: 「おかえり、パパ」

description.en: A high school girl is trying to get obsessively close to her kind stepdad. Even going as far as watching him in bed with her mom.
description.ru:
У женщины, на которой я женился, есть дочь. Её зовут Тоуко и она второкурсница старшей школы.
Я заволновался, когда узнал, что у меня появится дочь-подросток, но я рад, что, похоже, понравился ей.

Но был один странный момент, когда расстояние между нами стало слишком близким?..

"Пожалуйста, позаботься обо мне с этого момента, папа ♡"

Я уверен, что никто не знает, кто этот ребёнок на самом деле.
description.pt-br: A mulher com quem me casei tem uma filha, uma estudante do segundo ano chamada Toru Sakurako.  Fiquei preocupada quando soube que a filha dela ainda era uma garota do ensino médio, então fiquei feliz em ver que nos demos bem. Mas às vezes, Toru parecia chegar um pouco perto demais...?

altTitles.zh: 全民转职：我牧师，都什么阴间技能

altTitles.vi: Tiān Shēng Dú Nǎi, Wǒ Zǔzhòule Quán Shìjiè!

description.en:
Traveling through a parallel world, the game merges with the real world, where ferocious beasts are rampant, alien races are raging, and there are a large number of dungeons and secret realms in the wild.
Humans can awaken into various professions and work hard to kill monsters and upgrade.
On the day of his profession awakening, Lin Luo awakened the priest profession, which is the most popular but has no damage ability.
Just when he was struggling, he discovered that his skills had mutated!
The blood recovery technique mutates into the bleeding technique?
Blessing mutates into curse?
But I am really a healing priest!

title.en: Ake no Joi to Yoi no Majo

altTitles.ja: 明けの女医と宵の魔女～僕と彼女のみだらなカルテ～

altTitles.en: The Morning Doctor and the Evening Witch

description.en:
Kou is in search for a cure to his special illness.

He arrives at visits Hakone, a remote clinic. Despite the spacious clinic with a swimming pool and other facilities, a sole doctor named Babel lives there alone. She diagnoses that Kou's treatment requires contact with the seductive opposite sex.

This is the story of a daily medical examination between an innocent boy and a bewitching female doctor, which can never be told to others.

altTitles.ja: おかん系幼馴染

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

altTitles.ja: 女将軍✕兵卒

title.en: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Koto Nairan-hen

altTitles.ja-ro: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Ancient City Insurrection Arc

altTitles.en: The Irregular at Magic High School -  Ancient City Insurrection Arc

altTitles.ru: Непутёвый ученик в школе магии: Волнение в Древней Столице

altTitles.ja: 魔法科高校の劣等生 古都内乱編

altTitles.ja-ro: Mahō-ka Kōkō no Rettō Nama Koto Nairan-hen

description.en:
Zhou Gongjin, who was the mastermind of what happened in the Parasite Doll incident of Nine Schools Competition, has fled from Yokohama to the area of the original ancient magic users group centred around Kyoto also known as the *traditionalists*.   
Since then two months have passed and the National High School Magic Thesis Competition will soon be held again. This year's Thesis Competition is being held in Kyoto sponsored by the Magic Association and in their conference hall.   
Tatsuya gets visited by the Kuroba twins who as representatives bring Yotsuba Maya's letter to him. The letter is a request from his aunt saying "I hope for your cooperation to capture Zhou Gongjin".  
While it is questionable that whether it is a "command" rather than a "request", Tatsuya and Miyuki go to Kudou's house as they are in the centre as opponents of the traditionalists. As a result, the two siblings have a fated encounter with the "Genius Augmented Magician”.   
Conspiracy of the ancient city was the stage. The fate that has continued to smoulder away in the back of the history of magician development, Tatsuya and Miyuki and his companions are challenged.   
  
Adaptation of the original novel's volumes 14-15.

altTitles.ja: チェンソーマン

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**

title.en: I Only Want to Beat You

altTitles.en: I Want to Beat You, Oh Roji
I Want to Defeat You, Oh Roji

description.en: The male lead 'Lee Gigo', who has never lost a single time in his life, and the female lead who defeated him 'Oh Roji'. Who will end up as the victor of this 'bet'?
description.uk: Головний герой Лі Ґіґо, який жодного разу в житті не програв, і головна героїня, яка перемогла його, О Роджі. Хто в підсумку стане переможцем в цьому «парі»?
description.es-la: El protagonista masculino que nunca ha sido derrotado en su vida 'gana', la heroína femenina 'solo' que hizo ese guiño pierde por primera vez ¿Quién será el ganador de esta 'apuesta'?

altTitles.en: Becoming a God by Being the Center of Attention

description.en: With the constant development of technology on Earth, people no longer need to worship the weather gods. Because of this, the rain god, Yushi’s, power starts disappearing. He decides to venture onto Earth under the name “Shiyu” in order to restore his power. Soon scouted by an evil boss into a near-bankrupt entertainment company. Shiyu is sent to participate in the show “I am an idol.” With absolutely zero common sense he somehow still manages to gain popularity and debut in the group SWEN alongside three other members. Overtime, Shiyu comes to discover that his groupmate, Yang Dongjun, and Zhong Yun were also gods who came to the world to work and earn faith…
description.tr: Dünya teknolojisinin sürekli olarak gelişmesi ile insanların artık hava ile ilgilenen Tanrılara ibadet etmesine ihtiyaçları kalmaz. Bu sebeple Yağmur Tanrısı, Yushi'nin, gücü kaybolmaya başlar. Gücünü yenilemek için 'Shiyu' ismi altında Dünya'ya gitmeye karar verir. Kısa süre sonra kötü bir patron tarafından iflas etmek üzere olan bir eğlence şirketinde keşfedilir. Shiyu 'Ben Bir İdolüm' adlı programa katılım göstermesi için gönderilir. Sahip olduğu sıfır sağduyu ve diğer üç üye ile birlikte SWEN grubunda bir şekilde popülerlik kazanmayı ve çıkış yapmayı başarır. Mesai sırasında grup arkadaşları Tan Donjun ve Zhong Yun'un da kendisi gibi inanç kazanmak için Dünya'ya gelen Tanrılar olduğunu keşfeder.

description.en: The Ice Age apocalypse is coming. After being betrayed and killed by my secret crush, I was reborn and gained a magical ability - the snacks I ate suddenly turned into plants? What's surprising is that this ability can be used in this way... Crisis is everywhere, I want to live for myself in this life!

In a world where monster hunters are hailed as heroes, Cheon Haesun has been treated like an outcast because of his abnormal looks. As if that wasn't bad enough, a pack of monsters attacks his neighborhood on the day he discovers he's dying from an unknown illness!

With his sister's sacrifice, Haesun survives and somehow awakens to become a Poisoner, a rare hunter with toxic healing abilities.

But will his poisonous powers cure Haesun's illness and guarantee a normal life he's always dreamed of?

altTitles.ja: アオのハコ

description.en:
Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr:
Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Delcourt/Tonkam**
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレ日誌

description.en:
A series of different yandere images by the artist @RinRin200001.

---

**Links:**
- Retail Site - [DLsite](https://www.dlsite.com/maniax-touch/work/=/product_id/RJ420882.html) (Includes Chapter 1-50)

**Notes:**
- From Chapter 134 the author has been publishing a "DereDere version" of the comic on their [FANBOX](https://rinrin83.fanbox.cc/)

altTitles.ja: きみとピコピコ

description.en: Oota, an otaku, joined the game club to live his ideal high school life. That was when he met by chance the freshman gal, Ageha Onisaki!! They dive straight into playing video games, but Ageha's choices are the Famicom (NES), the Super Famicom (SNES), and the Megadrive (Sega Genesis)! Who the heck is this person!? Playing a wide range from famous to retro games, the gal and the otaku start their heart-throbbing life!
description.pt-br: Oota, um otaku, ingressou no clube de jogos para viver sua vida ideal de colegial. Foi quando ele conheceu por acaso a caloura Ageha Onisaki!! Eles mergulham direto nos videogames, mas as escolhas de Ageha são NES, SNES e Megadora! Quem diabos é essa garota!? Jogando uma ampla variedade de jogos retrôs famosos, gal e o otaku começam sua agitada vida juntos!

altTitles.en: The Werewolf Wants to Eat His Favorite Detective

altTitles.ja: オオカミは探偵を食べたい

description.en: I have no confidence that I can "wait"."Werewolf Syndrome" - The spontaneous onset of a strange disease. Those who are affected present symptoms such as attacking and devouring humans. In this world, this is merely an urban legend, but, 10 years ago, Reito's brother was killed by a werewolf. Since then he has spent his life as a lone detective in order to expose the truth behind werewolves. Under such circumstances, he meets his estranged nephew for the first time in 10 years. Reito was briefly surprised to see that Yoru, who used to be a crybaby, is now a dashing university student who towers over him. Shortly after, Yoru suggests that Reito should hire him in the detective agency...?!

altTitles.ja: あかね噺

description.en: Rakugo--the ultimate form of storytelling, where everything in a story is expressed with just your body and words. Shinta and his daughter Akane have been seduced by this wonderful form of classical entertainment. Having observed her father strive to pass the shin'uchi rakugo test, Akane will take her own steps into this unique world!
description.fr:
Shinta s'est perfectionné 13 ans durant afin d'atteindre le statut de Shin'uchi, le plus haut rang des rakugo-ka. Mais malgré sa très bonne performance lors de l'examen de passage, le juge de l'épreuve, l'émérite Maître Arakawa Issho, a décidé de renvoyer de l'école Arakawa l'ensemble des participants sans donner davantage d'explication ! Ainsi s'arrêta nette la carrière de Shinta, qui avait tant sacrifié pour accomplir son rêve…
Mais Akane, la fille de Shinta qui admirait son père et son rakugo plus que tout, ne compte pas en rester là !
description.th:
ที่สุดแห่งศิลปะการเล่าเรื่องที่ใช้ผู้แสดงเพียงหนึ่งคนและเรื่องเล่าเพียงหนึ่งเรื่อง --- "ราคุโกะ" นักราคุโกะ อาราคาวะ ชินตะและอาคาเนะลูกสาวของเขาต่างก็หลงเสน่ห์ของความบันเทิงอันสุดแสนจะเรียบง่ายนี้ ในวันที่ชินตะขึ้นเวทีแสดงในการสอบเลื่อนชั้นเป็นชินอุจิ อาคาเนะเองก็ได้ชมการแสดงนั้นอยู่และเส้นทางของนักราคุโกะที่อาคาเนะตัดสินใจก้าวเดินไปก็คือ---- มังงะราคุโกะขนานแท้ที่เหล่านักราคุโกะล้วนมาประชันฝีมือฟาดฟันกันได้เปิดฉากขึ้นแล้ว!

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.pt-br: Rakugo - a forma perfeita de contar histórias, na qual tudo na história é expresso apenas com seu corpo e palavras. Shinta e sua filha, Akane, foram seduzidos por essa maravilhosa forma clássica de entretenimento. Observando seu pai treinar para passar no teste de Shin’uchi, Akane avança neste mundo único.

altTitles.ja: ライブ

description.en: Onigawara Yuutarou is your average high school kid, a bit on the quiet, kind-hearted side. One day, he walks through an arcane ritual and ends up summoning a demon, Slayer, who will grant him 3 wishes. Horrified by Slayer's violence, Yuutarou wishes for Slayer to stop using his demon powers, turning him into a human. Now Slayer's stuck with Yuutarou in a perfect personality mismatch, and to top things off, if one of them gets hurt, so does the other.

altTitles.ja: スライム聖女

description.en: The weakest monster (slime) who longed to be human is reincarnated as a saint, but with the worst character of all, a villainous noble girl. From the lowest status, hated and resented; an existence where she will be terminated immediately if her true identity as a slime is discovered, she will become a beloved saint in order to live a safe and secure life!

altTitles.ja: わんだふるぷりきゅあ!

description.en:
In Animal Town, humans and animals live together. Iroha is a young girl who loves animals and her close companion is her dog Komugi! One day, a mysterious creature GaruGaru goes berserk in the city. In order to protect Iroha, Komugi transforms into a human and not just any human, a Pretty Cure! These two Pretty Cures join forces to protect the berserk animals and return them to the Niko Garden.

(Source: Toei Animation USA)

title.en: Umineko WHEN THEY CRY Episode 7: Requiem of the Golden Witch

altTitles.ja-ro: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru Episode 7: Requiem of the Golden Witch

altTitles.ja: うみねこのなく頃に散　Episode7:Requiem of the golden witch

description.en: The time for logical debate and magical feints has come to an end; the revelation of the truth about Beatrice the Golden Witch is at hand. To facilitate this, game master Bernkastel has chosen Will Wright the Mage-Hunter to step onto her board and answer a single question: Who killed Beatrice? Joining him in the game is Lion Ushiromiya, Krauss's firstborn and heir, whose role is a mystery in its own right. Will's line of questioning draws together the stray strands from all the previous games, twisting them into a thread of truth, revisiting Kinzou's first encounter with the young Beatrice and working through the legends that have since sprung up around her... [Yen Press]

altTitles.ja: やっぱり似合わないぞ、嘘つきめ

altTitles.en: I Became the Younger Sister of a Regretful Obsessive Male Lead
I Became the Younger Sister of a Regretful Obsessive Male Lead

description.en:
One day, I transmigrated to an unknown story!
 
My parents here have passed away, and it was only after being adopted by a new duke that I realized what story I transmigrated to…
 
A tragic BL webtoon where all the characters die- and at the center of it, I’m the first side character to die!
 
And on top of that, I’m destined to die by my favorite character, Lucian’s, hands?!
 
Fortunately, or unfortunately, we’re here before the start of the tragedy.
Since I’ve been adopted by the dukedom where my favorite character is, there’s still plenty of time to change the ending!
 
However…
 
I just wanted to change Lucian into a sweet guy and have a happily ever after, but why is his obsession coming towards my direction?!

altTitles.ja: AIの反意

description.en:
**Links:**

- BGM Used - [「片思い」](https://dova-s.jp/_mobile/bgm/play19132.html)
description.ja:
使用BGM「片思い」
リンク:
https://dova-s.jp/_mobile/bgm/play19132.html

title.en: Shy na Ano Ko ni Natsukaretai

altTitles.ja: シャイなあの子に懐かれたい

altTitles.en: I Want To Be Liked By That Shy Girl

altTitles.ja: あそこではたらくムスブさん

altTitles.th: คุณมุสุบุกับงานของเธอ

description.en: Sagami Gorou works in sales at Shounan Rubber Industries Co., Ltd. He is secretly harboring feelings for Musubu, a girl working in the company's integrated development department. And what this lovely young scientist is researching day and night are actually…
description.es-la: La historia sigue a Sagami Gouro de 24 años que empieza a trabajar en Industria Shounan Gum S.A, allí conocerá a la investigadora Musubu-san una chica que trabaja en el laboratorio de desarrollo de asistencia médica la "casa", su primer encuentro no será precisamente el esperado.
description.pt-br: Sagami Gorou trabalha no setor de vendas da Indústria de Borracha Shounan Ltda e tem guardado seus sentimentos por Musubu, uma garota que trabalha no departamento de desenvolvimento integrado, em segredo. O objeto de estudo desta adorável cientista, na verdade é…

description.en:
[Woojin, who has lost his memories x Hamin, who has had an unrequited love for 13 years] 

An accident occurs where Woojin forgets 13 years worth of memories with Hamin. This causes a lot of panic for Hamin, as he has harbored unrequited feelings for him for those 13 years. Seeing this reaction, a misunderstanding occurs where Woojin believes that they are dating…

title.en: Kyou, Eki de Mita Kawaii Onna no Ko.

altTitles.en: Cute Girl I Saw at the Station Today.

altTitles.ja: 今日、駅で見た可愛い女の子。

description.en:
An observational comedy about an older man obsessed with beauty products and a seemingly perfect girl(?!).
Kameyama, a middle-aged man, can't help but notice what the pretty girl he sees at the train station is wearing. That Milbon scent is loved by all of mankind! This glittering case is from Sebon Star! That glowing skin... isn't a treatment, just a highlight! Which brand's cosmetics wear off, and which ones last? "I wanna know all about it!" he thinks to himself. Many of those "young lady things" he's become obsessed with now, appear before him!
description.ja: 可愛いもの博識おじさん×完ぺき女子(!?)、駅で一瞬すれ違うだけの観察型コメディ！ アラフォーの亀山は、駅で見かける可愛い子が身に着けているものが気になって仕方がない。この全人類が好きな香りはミルボン！キラキラしたあの箱はセボンスター！ 肌ツヤは……美容医療ではなくハイライト！ どこのブランドが崩れにくい？ あ～～教えてくれ～～～～！ あなたが夢中になった「乙女アイテム」がたくさん登場！

altTitles.ja-ro: Toaru Majutsu no Index Gaiden: Toaru Kagaku no Railgun

altTitles.es: Un cierto cañón de riel científico

altTitles.th: เรลกัน แฟ้มลับคดีวิทยาศาสตร์

altTitles.ja: とある科学の超電磁砲
とある魔術の禁書目録外伝 とある科学の超電磁砲

description.en:
Welcome to a world where mysticism and science collide, and supernatural powers are derived from either science or religion. At the heart of this world is Academy City, an advanced metropolis whose population is comprised mostly of students The majority of students are enrolled in the city's "Power Curriculum Program," where they must learn to master their latent psychic powers. Out of several million students, only seven are deemed powerful enough to have Level 5 status.

Meet Mikoto Misaka, the third most powerful Level 5 ESPer in Academy City. Together with her best friends Kuroko Shirai and the other members of Judgment, a student-run law enforcement agency, Mikoto delves deep into the dark heart of the scientific sprawl she calls home, and uncovers secrets she wishes she hadn't!
description.ru:
Где-то на островах Южной Японии раскинулся Академия Сити - город, большинство жителей которого учатся и работают в школах юных эсперов. Обладатели паранормальных способностей в поте лица трудятся, чтобы познать свой дар и поднять владение им на новую высоту. Гордость школы Токивадай и всего города? Мисака Микото – третья по силе среди известных миру эсперов высшего уровня. У «Электрической принцессы» много полезных умений, одно из которых – ручной рейлган, то есть возможность своими электромагнитными способностями разогнать монетку где-то до трех Махов (на другом конце траектории стоять не рекомендуется). Но всех усилий Микото пока не хватает для решения двух насущных задач: отбиться от юрийных домогательств своей подруги Сирай Куроко и разобраться с наглым парнем по имени Камидзё Тома!


---

altTitles.ja: ちょいあ!

description.en: 4-koma about an otaku girl and her friends.

After suffering from a stalker, Yoon Ji-gu becomes extremely wary of people. Just in time, a man with a strange sexual orientation moved into the neighbor's house...?
"Looks like there's a pervert living next door..."
In reality, Lee Yeo-woon and Yoon Ji-gu are suspicious neighbors who are full of misunderstandings.
In the game, the couple neutaaaa (Lee Yeo-woon) and ji9byeol.
How will the relationship between the two change in and out of the game and reality?

altTitles.ja: ブルーロック

altTitles.th: BLUE LOCK ขังดวลแข้ง

description.de: Nach dem Aus im Achtelfinale bei der WM 2018 ruft der japanische Fußballverband ein Projekt ins Leben, das den ultimativen Stürmer erschaffen und Japan den Weltmeistertitel bringen soll: Blue Lock. Zu diesem Zweck werden die 300 talentiertesten Oberschüler versammelt, darunter auch Yoichi Isagi, ein unbeschriebenes Blatt. Kann er sich gegen die große Konkurrenz durchsetzen und Japans große Hoffnung werden?
description.en:
Yoichi Isagi lost the opportunity to go to the national high school championships because he passed to his teammate who missed instead of shooting himself. Isagi is one of 300 U-18 strikers chosen by Jinpachi Ego, a man who was hired by the Japan Football Association after the 2018 FIFA World Cup, to guide Japan to winning the World Cup by destroying Japanese football. Ego's plan is to isolate the 300 strikers into a prison-like institution called "Blue Lock", in order to create the world's biggest "egotist"/striker, which has been lacking in Japanese football.

---
**Notes:**
- **Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**

**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10008/episode/318774) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/blue-lock/)
description.fr:
Isagi Yoichi a perdu l'opportunité d'aller aux championnats nationaux des lycées parce qu'il a passé la balle à son coéquipier qui a raté son but. Isagi est l'un des 300 attaquants U-18 choisis par Ego Jinpachi, un homme qui a été embauché par la Fédération Japonaise de Football après la Coupe du Monde de la FIFA 2018, pour guider le Japon vers la victoire de la Coupe du Monde en détruisant le football japonais. Le plan d'Ego est d'isoler les 300 attaquants dans une institution semblable à une prison appelée "Blue Lock", afin de créer le plus grand "égoïste"/attaquant du monde, ce qui fait défaut dans le football japonais.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.pl:
Piłkarskie battle royale – tak można opisać całą tę historię.  
Z powodu niepowodzeń na mistrzostwach świata, Japoński Związek Piłki Nożnej postanawia wdrożyć program, dzięki któremu uda się stworzyć rewolucyjnego napastnika.  
Yoichi Isagi otrzymuje zaproszenie do wzięcia udziału w tym właśnie programie. Zamknięty w placówce o nazwie Blue Lock, będzie walczył z 299 innymi graczami i starał się zostać najlepszym napastnikiem na świecie.
description.vi: Blue Lock (ブルーロック Burū Rokku) hay Dự án bồi dưỡng cầu thủ đặc biệt là một dự án chuyên đào tạo những tiền đạo trẻ từ khắp nơi trên đất nước Nhật Bản, bao gồm 3 vòng tuyển chọn chính và các vòng phụ. Dự án này có sự tham gia của 300 tiền đạo trẻ và họ sẽ đối đầu trực tiếp với nhau trong các vòng đấu loại trực tiếp.
description.pt-br: Yoichi Isagi perdeu a oportunidade de ir para o campeonato nacional do ensino médio porque ele passou para seu companheiro de equipe que perdeu em vez de chutar para o gol si mesmo. Isagi é um dos 300 atacantes de Sub-18 escolhidos por Jinpachi Ego, contratado pela Associação de Futebol do Japão após a Copa do Mundo de 2018, para guiar o Japão na conquista da Copa do Mundo ao destruir o futebol japonês. O plano de Ego é isolar os 300 atacantes em uma instituição parecida com uma prisão chamada “Blue Lock”, para criar o maior “egoista” / atacante do mundo, que tem faltado no futebol japonês.

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

altTitles.ja: 金縛り中の抵抗
禁断師弟でブレイクスルー
禁断師弟でブレイクスルー～勇者の息子が魔王の弟子で何が悪い～
禁断師弟でブレイクスルー~ボーイ・ミーツ・サタン~

altTitles.ja-ro: Kindan Shitei de Breakthrough ～ Yuusha no Musuko ga Maou no Deshi de Nani ga Warui ～
Kindan Shitei de Breakthrough: Boy Meets Satan

altTitles.en: A Breakthrough Brought by Forbidden Master and Disciple
Breakthrough with the Forbidden Master: So What If the Hero's Son Is the Demon King's Disciple
A Breakthrough Came out by Forbidden Master and Disciple

altTitles.tr: Kahramanın Oğlu ve İblis Kral Öğretmeni

description.en:
The hero's son and the ghost of the Demon King are the master and pupil!?  
  
Eirth, the son of the hero who defeated the Great Demon King, is troubled.  
Always expected to achieve great things, but unable to meet those expectations.  
No matter the effort he puts in, and the results he obtains, it's never enough for them.  
"I'm a disappointment compared to my father" or "Don't you know you're the son of the hero!!"  
Living every day like this, Eirth meets his destiny in the room containing the sword of his father, the hero.  
  
"Interesting. I will train you. I have only free time now.”  
  
Eirth receives special personal training from the Demon King just to get back at his parents and the world.  
In the coming days, his parents, the heroes of the past, his first love, the princess childhood friend,  
the geniuses of the era, and the world will tremble before him.
description.tr:
Büyük İblis Kralı yenen kahramanın oğlu Eirth, zorluklar yaşamaktadır.
Hep büyük şeyler başarması beklenir ama bu beklentileri karşılayamaz.
Ne kadar çaba gösterse ve elde ettiği sonuçlar ne kadar iyi olsa da, asla yeterli değildir.
“Hep babana kıyasla bir hayal kırıklığısın” veya “Kahramanın oğlu olduğunu bilmiyor musun!!” gibi sözlerle yaşamak zorunda kalır.
Her gün böyle geçerken, Eirth babasının kahramanlık kılıcının bulunduğu odada kaderiyle karşılaşır.

“İlginç. Seni eğiteceğim. Şu anda bolca boş vaktim var.”

Eirth, ailesinden ve dünyadan intikam almak için İblis Kralından özel bir eğitim alır.
Gelecek günlerde, geçmişin kahramanları olan ailesi, ilk aşkı prenses çocukluk arkadaşı, dönemin dahileri ve dünya onun önünde titreyecektir.
description.pt-br: O filho do herói virou discípulo do espirito do rei demônio!? Eirth, filho do herói que derrotou o grande rei demônio se encontra em conflito. Sempre esperam grandes feitos dele, mas ele nunca consegue cumprir com as expectativas. Não importa quanto esforço ele coloque, o resultado nunca satisfaz aqueles ao seu redor. “Sou uma falha comparado ao meu pai” ou “Você não é o filho do herói?” E vivendo todos os dias assombrado por expectativas desta forma, Eirth finalmente tem um encontro destinado na sala da espada sagrada de seu pai. “Interessante, eu irei treiná-lo. Tenho bastante tempo livre agora.” Assim, Eirth começa a receber um treinamento especial do rei demônio para surpreender seus pais e todo mundo. Todos estão prestes a tremer diante dele!

title.en: Moto Ansatsusha, Tensei Shite Kizoku no Reijou ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 元暗殺者、転生して貴族の令嬢になりました

altTitles.en: A Former Assassin Was Reborn as a Blue-Blooded Daughter

description.en:
The story is about Serena, a former assassin who was reincarnated as a duke's daughter after failing her mission. She initially thought that pretending to be a noble would be easy, but she struggled with the gap in perception between herself and her mother, who had a flighty personality, and her adoptive sister, who deceived those around her in an attempt to push Serena out of the picture.

Despite skillfully dodging the harassment she faced at the tea parties full of rivalry and navigating the complex social life of a school embroiled in love and hate, Serena's cold demeanor resulted in her being ostracized and isolated. One day, she discovers that her adoptive sister is engaged to the second prince, which leads her to run away from home. However, it is at this point that the first prince, Evan, appears in front of her...

Follow Serena, a former assassin who knows nothing of love, as she charges forward into the aristocratic society of another world in this comedic, occasionally romantic tale.
description.ja:
任務に失敗した暗殺者が転生したのは、公爵令嬢のセレナ。「私は元暗殺者。なりすますなんて簡単だ」そう思っていたセレナだが、 頭がお花畑な母親や、彼女を蹴落とそうと周りを欺く義妹などとの感覚のズレに日々いら立ち、生きづらさを感じていた。 
マウントだらけのお茶会に、愛憎ドロドロな学園生活……周囲からの嫌がらせを冷めた目で痛烈にかわしながらも、その冷徹さゆえに疎まれ孤立していくセレナ。 そしてある日、義妹が第二王子と婚約することを知り、ついに家出を決意する。しかしそこに第一王子のエヴァンが現れて--!?
愛を知らない元暗殺者が貴族社会を突き進む、異世界転生コメディときどきラブ!？

altTitles.ja: クールな同級生の◯◯年後...

altTitles.en: The Cool Classmate XX Years Later...

altTitles.ja: 平成敗残兵☆すみれちゃん
平成敗残兵⭐︎すみれちゃん
平成敗残兵すみれちゃん

description.en:
A formerly unsuccessful idol turned vagrant, Sumire-chan (31).

A vanquished survivor of the cutthroat competition in the showbiz world, with her mind and body both beaten by the struggle, she now lives in a run-down apartment where she spends her days lazing around, for the time being.  Her cousin Yuusei, a first-year highschooler, has been keeping an eye on her and comes to her with a proposal for a moneymaking idea.

"You have a nice body, so let's release a doujin gravure photobook."
Will Sumire-chan actually be able to stage a comeback in the world of the Reiwa era!? 
Let's stay tuned!

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレな幼馴染

description.en:
In this world, there is: Confucianism; Taoism; Buddhism, Demons, and Magicians. Xu Qi’an, a graduate from the police academy, suddenly finds himself waking up in prison, to be exiled to the border three days later …

His initial goal was to protect himself in this world with no laws, and to be able to live a leisurely life as a rich man..

Many years later, Xu Qi’an looks back on the past, and the long-dead enemies and friends, as well as the numerous bones he has left behind.

As the Yangtze River flows eastward, the waves wash away the heroes; right and wrong, success or failure will all turn into nothing but history. However, just like the sun’s rays gleaming over the towering mountains, after the sunset, a new sun will rise.

altTitles.ja: 閃光マック+パトロールX

description.en:
After 40 years, two heroes have arrived in the present day!!
Ilmine Daiji, the all-powerful sci-fi hero "Senkou Mac" and
'Patrol X' is now in book form for the first time!!

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘シンデレラグレイ

description.en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.

title.en: Creepy Pharmacist: All My Patients are Horrific

altTitles.zh: 诡异药剂师：我的病人皆为恐怖

altTitles.zh-ro: Guiyi Yaoji Shi: Wo De Bingren Jie Wei Kongbu

description.en:
Will this treacherous darkness swallow you up, or will you survive as a unique existence? 

Lin En accidentally transmigrated into this monstrous world. As a rare human doctor, every one of his patients was moved by his "gentle" treatment and "sincere" service! 

“Anesthetics? Maybe next time."
"My knife is quick, it’ll be over soon~"

Welcome to Bloodsaw Pharmacy, where we will serve you wholeheartedly.

altTitles.ja: 梅花の想ひ人　日本昔噺選集

altTitles.ja-ro: Baika no Omohibito - Nihon Mukashi-Banashi Senshuu

altTitles.en: The Plum Blossom's Beloved - A Collection of Folktales from Japan

description.en:
Beautifully illustrated, and deftly demonstrating an innate sense of the power of color palette, Oku’s collection boasts folktales hailing from Kyoto’s Honnoji Temple, folklore surrounding Nagano’s Biwa-Ike, and many more short stories of all manner passed down throughout Japan!

Love, joy, sorrow, and regret live on, evocative as ever, in this 21st century imaginative visual retelling of ancient tales.

altTitles.en: Ultra Kaiju Anthropomorphic Project Galaxy Days
Ultra Kaiju Personification Project Galaxy Days

altTitles.ja-ro: Ultra Kaijuu Gijinka Keikaku Galaxy Days

altTitles.ja: ウルトラ怪獣擬人化計画 ギャラクシー☆デイズ

description.en: A comedy 4-koma manga that reimagines the monstrous kaiju from Ultraman as adorable high school girls!

altTitles.ja: 猫が如く

description.en:
The Yakuza boss is... a cat!? The "brown tiger" group boss, Oyaji. Yanagi, the new recruit in the Yakuza, and the gang members are once again at the mercy of the carefree Oyaji today... But it's not that bad.
A lively comedy about a cat... Begins!!

The title Like a Cat, or Neko ga Gotoku, is a parody of the Yakuza game series' title which is Like a Dragon or Ryu ga Gotoku.
description.pt-br:
O chefe da Yakuza é... um gato!? O chefe do grupo "tigre marrom", Oyaji. 
Yanagi, o novo recruta da Yakuza, e os membros da gangue estão mais uma vez à mercê do despreocupado Oyaji ... Mas não é tão ruim assim.
Uma animada comédia sobre um gato... Começa!!

O título Like a Cat, ou Neko ga Gotoku, é uma paródia do título da série de jogos Yakuza, que é Like a Dragon ou Ryu ga Gotoku.

altTitles.ja: カッコいい女の子と12センチの約束

altTitles.en: A Cool Girl and a 12cm Promise

altTitles.es-la: Una chica genial y una promesa de 12 cm

description.en:
A boyish childhood friend grows up to be a super hot girl!

---

Serialization of the Twitter webcomic *[A Story About Becoming Cooler Than the Cool Girl](https://mangadex.org/title/d0407445-b80d-4854-9f12-c8227f94cba6/)*.

altTitles.ja: 日々、君

description.en: Hasuno, a screenwriter with zero housekeeping skills, decides to ask Higure, a junior student at his university whom he has always cared about, to do housework for him as a part-time job. As Higure takes care of Hasuno, a senior who he admires, he gradually begins to notice a change in his feelings. ......A pure and slightly carbonated love story between a popular scriptwriter with beauty in all directions and a quiet junior student.
